character.name: Detective Leń
character.legend: Detective Leń(Лень) is a detective from noir-world, which he has saved once already. He is lazy most of the time, except that moments when ladies are involved, or if he is in a good mood, which is usually noir-bad. He lost his true love, so he doesn't want to get close with anyone and take responsibilities.

character.name: Fatty Kathy
character.legend: Fatty Kathy is a really fat kolkhoz woman. Lost her husband and child, after a werewolf broke into their house at Fullmoon Night. Hates men who brake into her house. Is a member of U.M.H.
